attributes.action: Make Local Authorities create a sinking fund to fund their future pension obligations properly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently Local Authorities are paying pensions out of current income (i.e. they pay this years pensioners out of this years income). Companies and everyone else must pay pensions from funds built up over time. With an aging population, the "current year" funding cannot be sustained at reasonable council tax levels. Make the local authorities create a sinking fund (i.e make payments from today's income into a fund) to start to fund these future costs.
